snippet: A Federal Reserve official’s remarks stirred hopes for stimulus, and the European Central Bank kept the door open to making a future cut to its main interest rate.
abstract: Stocks surge as remarks from a Federal Reserve official stir stimulus hopes and Europe indicates it may cut its main interest rate in future.

byline.contributor: Jack Ewing contributed reporting from Frankfurt.Jack Ewing contributed reporting from Frankfurt.

lead_paragraph: A Federal Reserve official’s remarks stirred hopes for stimulus, and the European Central Bank kept the door open to making a future cut to its main interest rate.

headline.seo: Shares Rise on Wall Street and in Europe
headline.main: Stocks Jump After Central Bank Officials’ Remarks
headline.print_headline: Central Banks’ Actions Help Buoy Markets
